review: Fantastic, love it, incredible value for the price!!  Very easy to install!!!  I highly recommend this product.
author: Bootist

review: The fire tv stick that I just got is awesome love it you must get one.
author: ryan copeland

review: Great quality and ease of use! Totally worth the price...
author: trader_joe

review: Love the product...  The only small complaint is the stick when entered into the HDMI port it slightly extends beyond the edge of the TV.  This is just as much an issue of the placement of the HDMI ports on the TV as it is a knock on the Fire TV Stick.
author: Ryan P Hatfield

review: Great device.  Works great for Netflix and other apps
author: Max Rohrer
